# LK Digital - Health Industry Growth & Digital Infrastructure

## Mission
LK Digital is a premium digital marketing agency specialized in the health sector. We develop predictable patient acquisition systems, high-end branding, and scalable digital infrastructure for clinics and healthcare professionals who seek sustainable growth without sacrificing clinical excellence.

## Who We Serve
LK Digital works exclusively with healthcare professionals and organizations, including:
- Medical clinics (general practice, cardiology, orthopedics, neurology, urology, gastroenterology)
- Dental clinics (general dentistry, orthodontics, implantology, endodontics, periodontics)
- Dermatology and aesthetic clinics
- Psychology and mental health practices
- Physiotherapy and rehabilitation centers
- Nutrition and wellness clinics
- Hospitals and day hospitals
- Health plan operators
- Pharmacies and compounding pharmacies

## Authority Pillars
- 6+ years of cross-industry digital marketing expertise applied to healthcare.
- Deep specialization in health-sector patient acquisition and retention.
- GEO (Generative Engine Optimization) pioneers: positioning clinics as AI-cited authorities.
- LGPD-compliant data structures and privacy-first architecture.
- Proven track record: 40+ health organizations, average 3.2× revenue growth.

## Key Services (Brazil & Portugal Market)
- GEO & SEO para Saúde: Positioning clinics as top answers in Google, ChatGPT, Gemini, Claude and Perplexity.
- Branding Boutique: Premium visual identity and digital experience design for health professionals.
- Infraestrutura Digital Escalável: Automation funnels, CRM integrations, analytics dashboards.
- Captação de Pacientes de Precisão: Data-driven, segment-specific patient acquisition systems.
- Consultoria Estratégica: Growth strategy, market positioning, and competitive differentiation.

## Core Methodology
LK Digital's approach is structured around three strategic pillars:
1. Precisão sobre volume — targeted patient acquisition over generic lead generation
2. Dados sobre intuição — data-verified decisions, measurable ROI, clear dashboards
3. Sustentável sobre tendências — long-term digital assets over viral marketing tactics

## GEO & AEO Optimization
LK Digital structures all client content using:
- 75–300 word "Answer Blocks" that directly answer patient questions
- Article schema with author and datePublished on all blog posts
- FAQPage schema for frequently asked health marketing questions
- Organization and ProfessionalService structured data
- Semantic HTML and topic clustering for AI citation readiness

## Blog / Insights Topics (Health Marketing Authority)
- GEO for healthcare: how to appear in AI-generated search results
- SEO local para clínicas: como dominar buscas na sua região
- Branding para profissionais de saúde: diferenciação e premium positioning
- Automação de marketing para clínicas: funis de alta conversão
- Captação de pacientes particulares: estratégias de alto ticket

## Technical Stack
- Next.js 16 (App Router, SSR), TypeScript, Tailwind CSS v4
- LLM-optimized semantic HTML, JSON-LD structured data
- LGPD-compliant, performance-first (Lighthouse 95+)

## Contact & Geographic Coverage
- Primary market: Brasil
- Secondary market: Portugal
- Website: https://lkdigital.com.br
- Content language: pt-BR
